metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10996 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Percona XtraDB Cluster before 5.7.28-31.41.2. Abundled script inadvertently sets a static transition_key for SST processesin place of the random key expected.

criterions.comment: percona-xtradb-cluster-5.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
